statements: SELECT * FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE affordability_index > 4.5;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_house_price FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_income > 50000;
SELECT neighborhood_id, affordability_index, median_income FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_house_price < 100000 ORDER BY median_house_price ASC;
SELECT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name, affordability_index FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE affordability_index < 3;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_house_price FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY median_house_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT neighborhood_name, median_income, affordability_index FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_house_price < 300000 ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT neighborhood_id, neighborhood_name FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex ORDER BY neighborhood_name, median_house_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_income BETWEEN 40000 AND 80000 ORDER BY median_income ASC, affordability_index DESC;

SELECT neighborhood_name, median_house_price, median_income, affordability_index FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE median_house_price > 500000 AND median_income < 70000 ORDER BY affordability_index DESC, neighborhood_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM housing_affordability_indexes ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT neighborhood, affordability_index FROM housing_affordability_indexes WHERE number_of_bedrooms = 2;
SELECT neighborhood, population FROM demographic_data WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY neighborhood;
SELECT AVG(affordability_index) AS average_affordability FROM housing_affordability_indexes;
SELECT neighborhood, population, median_income FROM demographic_data WHERE population > 10000 AND median_income < 60000 ORDER BY neighborhood ASC;
SELECT neighborhood, average_price, affordability_index FROM housing_affordability_indexes WHERE number_of_bedrooms = 2 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT population, median_income FROM demographic_data WHERE neighborhood = 'Downtown' OR neighborhood = 'Suburb' ORDER BY population DESC, median_income ASC;
SELECT neighborhood, average_price, affordability_index FROM housing_affordability_indexes WHERE affordability_index < 0.5 AND average_price < 200000 ORDER BY neighborhood ASC, average_price ASC;
SELECT neighborhood, population FROM demographic_data WHERE median_income > 50000 ORDER BY population DESC;

SELECT * FROM housing_affordability_indexes LEFT JOIN demographic_data ON housing_affordability_indexes.neighborhood = demographic_data.neighborhood WHERE median_income IS NOT NULL ORDER BY affordability_index DESC;
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods
SELECT neighborhood_name, city FROM Neighborhoods
SELECT neighborhood_name, state FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_name DESC
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordability WHERE affordability_index > 100
SELECT neighborhood_name, population FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Demographics ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Demographics.neighborhood_id
SELECT * FROM Neighborhoods ORDER BY neighborhood_id DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, city, state FROM Neighborhoods WHERE state='CA';
SELECT neighborhood_name, population, median_age, housing_price FROM Neighborhoods JOIN Demographics ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = Demographics.neighborhood_id;

SELECT neighborhood_name, median_income, housing_price FROM Neighborhoods JOIN HousingAffordability ON Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id = HousingAffordability.neighborhood_id WHERE median_income > 60000;

SELECT neighborhood_name, affordability_index, city FROM HousingAffordability JOIN Neighborhoods ON HousingAffordability.neighborhood_id = Neighborhoods.neighborhood_id WHERE affordability_index <50 ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_affordability;
SELECT neighborhood_name, affordability_index FROM neighborhood_affordability ORDER BY affordability_index DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, total_population FROM neighborhood_affordability INNER JOIN population_data ON neighborhood_affordability.neighborhood_id = population_data.neighborhood_id;
SELECT amenity_name, amenity_type FROM amenities WHERE neighborhood_id = 1;

SELECT neighborhood_name, house_price, house_size FROM neighborhood_affordability INNER JOIN housing_prices ON neighborhood_affordability.neighborhood_id = housing_prices.neighborhood_id ORDER BY house_price DESC, house_size ASC;
SELECT * FROM neighborhood_affordability ORDER BY affordability_index DESC;
SELECT neighborhood_name, affordability_index FROM neighborhood_affordability WHERE affordability_index > 80;
SELECT neighborhood_name, house_price FROM neighborhood_affordability JOIN housing_prices ON neighborhood_affordability.neighborhood_id = housing_prices.neighborhood_id WHERE house_price < 500000;

SELECT neighborhood_name, total_population FROM neighborhood_affordability JOIN population_data ON neighborhood_affordability.neighborhood_id = population_data.neighborhood_id WHERE total_population > 10000;

SELECT neighborhood_name, amenity_name, amenity_type FROM neighborhood_affordability JOIN amenities ON neighborhood_affordability.neighborhood_id = amenities.neighborhood_id WHERE amenity_type = 'Park' ORDER BY neighborhood_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex;
SELECT nh_id, nh_name, median_income FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex ORDER BY median_income DESC;
SELECT nh_name, housing_price_index FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex WHERE housing_price_index < 3000;
SELECT nh_id, population_density FROM NeighborhoodPopulation WHERE population > 50000 ORDER BY population_density ASC;
SELECT house_id, num_bedrooms, square_footage FROM HousingInventory WHERE num_bedrooms = 3 AND square_footage > 1500;
SELECT nh_name, median_income FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex;
SELECT * FROM NeighborhoodPopulation WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT nh_name, median_income, housing_price_index FROM HousingAffordabilityIndex INNER JOIN HousingCosts ON HousingAffordabilityIndex.nh_id = HousingCosts.nh_id;
SELECT nh_name, monthly_rent FROM HousingCosts WHERE monthly_rent < 1500 AND monthly_mortgage > 2000;
SELECT nh_name, housing_affordability_score, rating FROM AffordabilityRating ORDER BY housing_affordability_score DESC, rating ASC;
